trans-unit.source: Propagates the current behavior in the expression to child nodes.
trans-unit.target: Propaga o comportamento atual na expressão para nós filho.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: This class is used by all <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.IRuleExpression> methods to propagate behavior to child nodes.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe é usada por todos os <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.IRuleExpression> métodos para propagar o comportamento de nós filho.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAnalysis" /> instance that stores symbols representing the properties and fields used by rule conditions and actions.
trans-unit.target: A instância <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAnalysis" /> que armazena os símbolos que representam as propriedades e os campos usados por ações e condições de regra.

trans-unit.source: The expression being executed.
trans-unit.target: A expressão que está sendo executada.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if fields and properties read by a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction" /> are to be added to <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAnalysis" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se os campos e as propriedades lidos por um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction" /> precisarem ser adicionados ao <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAnalysis" />; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if fields and properties written by a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction" /> are to be added to <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAnalysis" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se os campos e as propriedades gravados por um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction" /> precisarem ser adicionados ao <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAnalysis" />; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The path of a field or property determined up to this point.
trans-unit.target: O caminho de um campo ou propriedade determinado até este ponto.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the fields and properties used by an expression and adds these as symbols to the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAnalysis" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: Identifica os campos e as propriedades usados por uma expressão e adiciona-os como símbolos à instância <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAnalysis" />.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="analysis" /> is a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="analysis" /> é uma referência nula (<see langword="Nothing" /> no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: The expression that the clone is based on.
trans-unit.target: A expressão em que o clone se baseia.

trans-unit.source: Creates a deep copy of the child nodes of the current <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeExpression" />.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma cópia profunda dos nós filho do <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeExpression" /> atual.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeExpression" /> that is identical to this instance.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeExpression" /> que é idêntico a esta instância.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Text.StringBuilder" /> that contains the mutable string of characters.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Text.StringBuilder" /> que contém a cadeia de caracteres mutável.

trans-unit.source: The current <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeExpression" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeExpression" /> atual.

trans-unit.source: The parent <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeExpression" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeExpression" /> pai.

trans-unit.source: Decompiles the child nodes of the expression into string form.
trans-unit.target: Descompila os nós filho de uma expressão na forma de cadeia de caracteres.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExecution" /> to execute the expression.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExecution" /> para executar a expressão.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeExpression" /> to evaluate.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeExpression" /> a ser avaliado.

trans-unit.source: Evaluates the expression and all child expressions.
trans-unit.target: Avalia a expressão e todas as expressões filho.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExpressionResult" /> that indicates the result of the expression evaluation.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExpressionResult" /> que indica o resultado da avaliação de expressão.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="execution" /> is a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="execution" /> é uma referência nula (<see langword="Nothing" /> no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: The first <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeExpression" /> in the comparison.
trans-unit.target: O primeiro <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeExpression" /> na comparação.

trans-unit.source: The second <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeExpression" /> in the comparison.
trans-unit.target: O segundo <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeExpression" /> na comparação.

trans-unit.source: Compares the current expression and child nodes to another expression to determine whether they are equal.
trans-unit.target: Compara os nós de expressão e filho atuais com outra expressão para determinar se são iguais.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the expressions are equal; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se as expressões forem iguais; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation" /> to manage the validation process.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation" /> para gerenciar o processo de validação.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeExpression" /> to evaluate.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeExpression" /> a ser avaliado.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if fields and properties written by a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction" /> are stored in by <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAnalysis" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se campos e propriedades gravados por um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction" /> forem armazenados por <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAnalysis" />; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Verifies that the expression and child nodes are configured correctly and has no errors.
trans-unit.target: Verifica se os nós filho e de expressão estão configurados corretamente e não têm erros.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExpressionInfo" /> for the <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeExpression" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExpressionInfo" /> para o <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeExpression" />.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="validation" /> is a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="validation" /> é uma referência nula (<see langword="Nothing" /> no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="expression" /> is null and the errors collection on the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation" /> object is a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" />).
trans-unit.target: O <paramref name="expression" /> é nulo e a coleção de erros sobre o objeto <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation" /> é uma referência nula (<see langword="Nothing" />).
